mapper.insert: insert into food (id, title, price, img, type, dec) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dec,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update food set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dec = #{dec,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, title, price, img, 'type', 'dec' from food
